name: Visual Studio Ordered Test File
summary: Learn about .ORDEREDTEST files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ORDEREDTEST files are saved using XML formatting and can be viewed with a text editor if needed.

description: Test container file created by Microsoft Visual Studio, a software development tool that allows developers to create Windows applications; contains references to tests to run for a project, such as unit tests; used for organizing test cases for automated execution.
